iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieRepeatMode/none#Discussion)

Content is not repeated when playback finishes
